  • Uses of KeyToGroupMap in org.jfree.data

    Methods in org.jfree.data with parameters of type KeyToGroupMap
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static Range DatasetUtilities.getStackedRangeExtent​(CategoryDataset dataset, KeyToGroupMap map)
    Returns the minimum and maximum values for the dataset's range (as in domain/range), assuming that the series in one category are stacked.
